title.content: We’re a collective of professional rebels

message.content: art direction performance tv shows/tours music videos audiovisual content concept creation concerts site-specific art brand events community events stage design light&sound
We are all different but connected by shared passion for things we love.

creative.title: Creative = the gist
creative.description: A term, perhaps, of dubious originality, but the act is like no other. The flow of bold ideas that lead us to that captivating pulse of novelty and cool experience.

culture.title: Culture = the love
culture.description: Independent culture opens the space for change and a deeper sense of the world and society around. And we f*cking love it.

community.title: Community = the form
community.description: Our basic instinct is to be together. Wake up the potential and spark the talent among each other. Community gives space for creating magic across disciplines.

footer.socials: Wanna see what's fresh on the set?
